"@Silent_Witness":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54572e076368720bca890100#post_54572e076368720bca890100
I know it's gonna sound weird, but I honestly think I'm gonna miss it. It's complete dog garbage but it's had some cool moments. And Rock Lee is amazing. It's kind of like an enemy you've battled so many times that when you see him fall you can't help but feel a little saddened.

[bq="uc9"]*FUCK!*
My homework link for a huge ass project was a broken link.  The reason why this is a problem is that the teacher either accepts a 100 for your grade or you're getting a F; no inbetween.

I'm fucking sick of this school; I'm going to my guidance counselor cause the amount of bullshit at this school is ridiculous cause I can't pass the class anymore cause dropbox is fucking stupid.[/bq]
The amount of trouble it has caused you is worthy of quitting
